TopicTitle: Real space companies taking tips from KSP?

Articles.Content:
Well, there is some fantastic rockets and spacecraft here that would be good enough to be funded and used in real life. What if people like nasa are looking at this and taking peoples spaceship designs . I mean, think about it. if the people here got a massive

sum of money, wouldn\'t we just mess around like this but in real life? Agh god, I dont even know here I am going with this...

[move]:probe: <==(WTF?)[/move]
